hero.title: Corebiz Connector: integrate your VTEX store with TikTok Shop in just a few steps
hero.description: Expand your reach and sell more on TikTok. This page ensures that you have everything ready before starting the connector setup.
preRequisites.content.title: Before you start (Essential prerequisites)
preRequisites.content.description: Make sure you have the following before starting the integration.
preRequisites.items.vtexAccount.title: Active VTEX account
preRequisites.items.vtexAccount.label: VTEX Account
preRequisites.items.vtexAccount.descript: Have products, inventory, and a commercial policy configured (it can be just the main policy). Your VTEX account must be configured as a marketplace.
preRequisites.items.tiktokSeller.title: TikTok Shop Seller account
preRequisites.items.tiktokSeller.descrip: Create your seller account on TikTok Shop to start the integration.
preRequisites.alert.title: Important
preRequisites.alert.description: Currently, the Corebiz connector works only with the main VTEX account. For sub-account scenarios, a specific analysis is required.
preRequisites.footer.text: If you already have everything above, you are ready for the next step.
criarContaSeller.hero.title: Create a TikTok Shop Seller account
criarContaSeller.hero.description: Creating a seller account is the first step to making your products available on TikTok Shop. With it, you will be able to manage products, orders, deliveries, and payments.
criarContaSeller.step1.title: Create the seller account
criarContaSeller.step1.description: Access the Seller Center and start the registration process.
criarContaSeller.step1.intro.before: When starting the registration, remember to correctly select the
criarContaSeller.step1.intro.after: . You can create your account using:
criarContaSeller.step1.documents.title: Required documentation for registration
criarContaSeller.step1.documents.items: Verification selfies holding the document next to the face (clearly visible photo)
criarContaSeller.links.title: Useful links — TikTok Shop
criarContaSeller.links.description: Official documentation and policies to support your setup and operation.
criarContaSeller.links.items.accountRigh: Rights and rules for the official TikTok Shop account
tiktokSetup.title: TikTok Shop Setup
tiktokSetup.description: Let’s prepare your TikTok Shop environment for integration.
tiktokSetup.install.title: Step 1 - Install the Corebiz Connector on TikTok Shop
tiktokSetup.install.steps: Access your TikTok Shop Seller Center
Navigate to "Apps & Partners" in the main menu
Filter by "Popular platforms" with the value "VTEX"
Select the app "VTEX Sync by Corebiz"
Click "Install" and follow the indicated steps
tiktokSetup.token.title: Step 2 - Generate the permission token
tiktokSetup.token.steps: After installation, access the "App Store" section again
Locate the app "VTEX Sync by Corebiz"
Click the three dots icon (...) next to the app
tiktokSetup.brands.title: Create and authorize your brands on TikTok Shop
tiktokSetup.brands.description: Before starting catalog integration, it is essential to create product brands. This step prevents blocks or errors during processing. In addition, brand authorization proves that the seller has permission to sell products on TikTok Shop.
tiktokSetup.brands.steps: In the Seller Center, click the home icon in the top menu
Include the authorization type and required document
tiktokSetup.tip.title: Important tip
tiktokSetup.tip.description: Make sure that the brand name in TikTok Shop is exactly the same as the one used in VTEX. This is essential for correct mapping and to avoid product blocks.
configurarConectorVtex.title: VTEX Admin Setup
configurarConectorVtex.description: In this step, you will configure your VTEX account to allow integration with TikTok Shop through the Corebiz connector.
appKeys.trigger: 1. Generate App Key and App Token
appKeys.steps.profile: Click on your profile avatar (top right corner).
appKeys.steps.settings: Go to Account settings → Application keys.
appKeys.steps.label: Fill in the label
appKeys.steps.role: Under Access profile, select Owner (Super Admin).
appKeys.alert.title: Important
appKeys.alert.description: The App Token will be displayed only once. Copy it immediately and store it in a secure location. If the token is lost, you will need to generate a new key.
afiliado.steps.admin: In the VTEX Admin, go to Store Settings → Orders → Settings or access:
afiliado.fields.name: Name
afiliado.values.name: TikTok Shop
installation.steps.apps: In the VTEX Admin side menu, go to Apps.
installation.steps.search: Search for Corebiz - TikTok Shop Connector or access:
installation.alert.title: Attention
installation.alert.description: The connector will only work if your store is authorized by Corebiz. Contact with the commercial team is required. This application is not free.
mapeamentoDeCampos.title: Field Mapping
mapeamentoDeCampos.description: Now that you have configured your VTEX account and installed the Corebiz connector, it is time to map the essential fields to ensure that your products are correctly synchronized with TikTok Shop.
mapeamentoDeCampos.access.title: Access to the Connector
mapeamentoDeCampos.access.description: All configurations and mappings are performed directly in the Corebiz connector panel within the VTEX Admin.
mapeamentoDeCampos.brandMapping.title: Brand Mapping
mapeamentoDeCampos.brandMapping.access.d: In the VTEX connector panel, access the Brand Mapping section or go to:
mapeamentoDeCampos.brandMapping.access.h: You must replace {{account}} with your VTEX store account if it is not yet configured.
mapeamentoDeCampos.brandMapping.steps.li: A list of your brands registered in VTEX will be displayed.
mapeamentoDeCampos.brandMapping.steps.se: For each brand, select the corresponding brand in TikTok Shop.
mapeamentoDeCampos.brandMapping.steps.au: Available brands in TikTok are those that already have approved authorization.
mapeamentoDeCampos.brandMapping.steps.sa: After mapping all brands, click Save.
mapeamentoDeCampos.brandMapping.rules.bl: Catalog integration will only be allowed after brand mapping is completed.
mapeamentoDeCampos.brandMapping.rules.li: The current version of the application supports connecting up to 999 brands.
mapeamentoDeCampos.categoryMapping.title: Category Mapping
mapeamentoDeCampos.categoryMapping.steps: A list with the VTEX category tree will be displayed.
Select VTEX categories one by one.
For each selected category, choose the corresponding category in TikTok Shop.
Check if the category selected in TikTok matches the value displayed above the selector.
After each category mapping, click Save changes.
mapeamentoDeCampos.logisticsMapping.acce: In the VTEX connector panel, access the Logistics Mapping section or go to:
mapeamentoDeCampos.logisticsMapping.step: Select the default warehouse to be used for catalog integration (e.g., TikTok Shop).
This warehouse will be the base for inventory and logistics of the integrated products.
Click Save to register the logistics mapping.
configCredenciasVtex.title: Credentials Setup
configCredenciasVtex.description: Now you will configure the necessary credentials in the Corebiz connector to establish communication between your VTEX store and TikTok Shop.
configCredenciasVtex.access.title: Access connector settings
configCredenciasVtex.access.description: Settings are performed directly in the connector panel within the VTEX Admin or access:
configCredenciasVtex.access.linkHelper: You will be redirected to the VTEX Admin. You must be logged in.
configCredenciasVtex.intro: In the settings tab, all fields must be filled in and the application must be active for the integration to work correctly.
configCredenciasVtex.activation.title: Application activation
configCredenciasVtex.vtexConfig.title: VTEX Configuration
configCredenciasVtex.vtexConfig.fields.e: same endpoint configured in the affiliate.
configCredenciasVtex.vtexConfig.fields.p: same policy configured in the affiliate.
configCredenciasVtex.tiktokConfig.title: TikTok Configuration
configCredenciasVtex.tiktokConfig.shopId: identification number of your TikTok Shop store.
configCredenciasVtex.tiktokConfig.helper: If you cannot view the ShopId in your seller profile, contact TikTok or the Corebiz team.
configCredenciasVtex.catalogConfig.title: Catalog Configuration
configCredenciasVtex.catalogConfig.varia: enter attribute names separated by commas (e.g., Size, Color, Print).
configCredenciasVtex.catalogConfig.limit: TikTok supports a maximum of 3 variations per product.
onboardingCompleted.title: Setup completed
onboardingCompleted.description: You have completed all the required steps to configure the VTEX + TikTok Shop connector. The information has been saved successfully and the environment is ready for activation.
onboardingCompleted.commercialActivation: This application is a paid Corebiz service. To use it in production, commercial activation is required.
onboardingCompleted.support.title: Support
onboardingCompleted.support.description: If you have technical questions or need additional assistance during the process:
onboardingCompleted.footer: After commercial activation, you will be able to start syncing products, prices, and inventory between VTEX and TikTok Shop.
onboardingCompleted.startIntegration: For more information, visit: Start Catalog Integration
integration.title: Catalog Integration
integration.description: At this stage, you will integrate your VTEX store products with TikTok Shop, track the integration status, and understand how post-integration management works.
integration.mappingReminder.title: Field mapping required
integration.mappingReminder.description: For the integration to work properly, it is necessary to configure field mapping in the connector, ensuring that the attributes required by TikTok Shop are correctly associated with VTEX fields.
integration.mappingReminder.link: For more information, visit: Field Mapping
integration.steps.startIntegration.title: 1. Start Catalog Integration
integration.steps.startIntegration.intro: In the TikTok Shop Connector panel in VTEX Admin, go to the Catalog Integration section.
integration.steps.startIntegration.list: Access the connector panel in VTEX Admin.
Choose one of the available integration options.
integration.steps.startIntegration.optio: Integrate entire catalog: recommended for stores with up to 1.000 products.
Integrate by collection: recommended for stores with more than 1.000 products. Enter the ID of the collection you want to integrate.
integration.steps.limits.title: 2. TikTok Shop Product Limit
integration.steps.limits.alertDescriptio: TikTok Shop allows sending up to 1.000 products per day.
integration.steps.limits.moreThanLimit: If your store has more than 1.000 products:
integration.steps.limits.list: The integration must be continued on the following day.
Products that are not processed will appear on the dashboard as not processed.
integration.steps.catalogConfig.title: 3. Catalog Configuration (Variations)
integration.steps.catalogConfig.descript: During integration, it is necessary to correctly configure the product variation attributes.
integration.steps.catalogConfig.exampleL: Enter the attribute names separated by commas. Example:
integration.steps.catalogConfig.alertDes: TikTok Shop supports up to 3 variations per product. Products exceeding this limit will have the variation ignored during integration.
integration.steps.requiredAttributes.des: Some categories require composition or ingredient information to be sent to TikTok Shop.
integration.steps.requiredAttributes.lis: The TikTok Composition field is mandatory for certain categories.
This field must be created as a SKU specification in VTEX and associated with the product category.
The composition or ingredient value must be filled directly in the SKU.
integration.steps.requiredAttributes.how: How to configure the TikTok Composition field
In VTEX Admin, go to Catalog > Categories.
Select the product category and click Actions > Field (SKU).
Click New Field and create the specification with the exact name TikTok Composition.
Save the field and then go to Catalog > Products and SKUs.
Select the product, open Specifications, and fill in the TikTok Composition field.
integration.steps.requiredAttributes.ale: If the TikTok Composition field does not exist or is not filled, the integration will automatically send the default value "Information currently unavailable." to TikTok Shop.
integration.steps.fashion.title: 5. Size Chart
integration.steps.fashion.description: For products in the Fashion category, TikTok accepts the submission of a size chart.
integration.steps.fashion.upload: The size chart can be uploaded in the Field Mapping tab of the connector.
integration.steps.fashion.path: VTEX Admin > Corebiz > TikTok Connector > Field Mapping
integration.steps.productCertification.d: Some categories, such as supplements, require certification proof before products can be published on TikTok Shop. In these cases, fill in the TikTok Certification field with the image link.
integration.steps.productCertification.h: How to configure the TikTok Certification field in VTEX Admin
Select the product category and click Actions > Field (product).
Click New Field and create the specification with the exact name TikTok Certification.
Save the field and then go to Catalog > Products and SKUs.
Select the product, open Specifications, and fill in the TikTok Certification field with the image link containing the expected details.
integration.steps.dashboard.title: 7. Integration Dashboard
integration.steps.dashboard.description: After starting the integration, you can track the entire process through the Connector Dashboard.
integration.steps.dashboard.listIntro: On the dashboard, you can view:
integration.steps.postIntegration.title: 8. Post-Integration Management
integration.steps.postIntegration.intro: After the catalog integration, some processes become automatic.
integration.steps.postIntegration.stockP: Stock and base price updates are sent automatically.
Make sure the trade policy configured in the connector matches the one used in VTEX.
integration.steps.postIntegration.shippi: Automatically generated by TikTok after the order is placed.
Available in the order within VTEX.
The label link is valid for approximately 2 days.
integration.steps.postIntegration.freeSa: Orders enter VTEX with a value of $0.01.
integration.steps.postIntegration.return: Return and exchange policies must be checked directly in the official TikTok Shop documentation.
contacts.title: Important Contacts
contacts.description: Here are the essential contacts for technical and commercial support related to the Corebiz VTEX + TikTok Shop connector.
docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Step-by-step guides for installing, configuring, and using the connector.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Frequently asked questions about configuration, orders, logistics, and catalog in the integration between VTEX and TikTok Shop.
faq.access.title: Access and Initial Configuration
faq.access.appKey.question: What is the format of the AppKey and AppToken and which permission profiles are required?
faq.access.appKey.answer: It must have Owner (Super Admin) – Restricted permission.
faq.access.integrationInfo.question: What information is required to integrate with VTEX?
faq.access.integrationInfo.items.tiktokT: Token generated in the TikTok Shop admin
faq.access.preConfig.question: Is any pre-configuration required in the VTEX environment?
faq.access.preConfig.answer: Yes. It is necessary to configure the marketplace in VTEX and have at least one active trade policy.
faq.clients.title: Customer Registration
faq.clients.customers.question: Are TikTok Shop customers registered in the VTEX customer list (CL)?
faq.clients.customers.answer: No. Customers originating from TikTok Shop are not added to the VTEX customer list (CL).
faq.commercial.title: Commercial Strategy and Policies
faq.commercial.policy.question: Is it necessary to create a new trade policy for TikTok Shop?
faq.commercial.policy.answer: Not necessarily. Creating a new trade policy is up to the merchant.
faq.payments.title: Payment Methods
faq.payments.payment.question: Which payment method appears on the order created in VTEX?
faq.payments.payment.answer: The payment is shown as assumed by the TikTok Shop affiliate.
faq.logistics.title: Shipping and Logistics
faq.logistics.shippingMethod.question: What is the default shipping method on TikTok Shop?
faq.logistics.shippingMethod.answer: The default method is “Shipped by the platform with standard shipping services”, automatically defined by TikTok.
faq.logistics.carriers.question: Which carriers are available?
faq.logistics.carriers.note: Each seller will be assigned to only one carrier after the first order.
faq.logistics.deliveryStatus.question: How will I know when the order has been delivered?
faq.logistics.deliveryStatus.alertDescri: Delivery confirmation is not displayed in VTEX. The last visible status will be the invoiced order.
faq.products.title: Synchronization and Special Flows
faq.products.sync.question: How does product synchronization work between VTEX and TikTok Shop?
faq.products.sync.paragraphs.intro: The integration between VTEX and TikTok Shop ensures that stock and base price (price without discounts) information is always up to date across both platforms.
faq.products.sync.paragraphs.updateFlow: Whenever there is a change in stock or base price of a product in VTEX, this update is automatically sent to TikTok Shop, preventing the sale of items with outdated prices or unavailable stock.
faq.products.sync.paragraphs.realtime: Synchronization happens automatically and in real time, as long as the product is properly published and linked between the platforms.
faq.products.sync.alert.title: Important note
faq.products.sync.alert.description: Stock and price synchronization considers the trade policy configured in the connector panel. Make sure the trade policy used in VTEX to display prices and control stock is the same one configured for synchronization with TikTok Shop.
faq.products.samples.question: How does free sample shipping for creators work?
faq.products.samples.paragraphs.flow: Free sample shipping follows a different flow compared to standard TikTok Shop orders and is handled in a more manual way.
faq.products.samples.paragraphs.tracking: Currently, TikTok has limitations regarding compatible carriers for this type of shipment. Therefore, it is necessary to generate and manually insert the tracking code in VTEX, either directly in the order or via ERP.
faq.products.samples.paragraphs.automati: To streamline this process, an automation was created in the connector so that the tracking code informed in VTEX is automatically sent to TikTok Shop.
faq.products.samples.paragraphs.value: Free sample orders enter VTEX with a value of R$ 0.01, since the system does not allow invoicing orders with a value of R$ 0.00.
faq.products.samples.alert.title: Important
faq.products.samples.alert.description: Since free sample delivery is not handled by TikTok Shop, the shipping label is not issued by TikTok.
shippingLabel.title: Shipping Label
shippingLabel.description: After an order is placed and the invoice is submitted, the shipping label is automatically generated by TikTok and sent to VTEX.
shippingLabel.howToView: How to view the shipping label in VTEX:
shippingLabel.steps.step3: Find the desired order in the list.
shippingLabel.steps.step4: The shipping label link will be available in the Tracking Number field.
shippingLabel.afterClick: After clicking the tracking number link, click "Go to the carrier tracking page".
shippingLabel.important.title: Important:
shippingLabel.important.description: The link generated by TikTok is valid for approximately 2 days. We recommend downloading the shipping label within this period.
shippingLabel.note.title: Note:
shippingLabel.note.description: For the first order placed, we recommend generating the shipping label manually directly in the TikTok Shop dashboard. This is necessary because additional shipping configurations may be required on the TikTok account. After this initial setup, shipping labels for subsequent orders will be generated automatically.
